key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on Asian manufacturing and global logistics
Legal disputes including trademark infringement and consumer protection lawsuits
Economic sensitivity to downturns and reduced consumer spending on discretionary items
Workforce reductions and potential impacts on operational efficiency and morale
Intense competitive pressures in the gaming hardware market
controversies: Trademark infringement case against GizPromo Corporation
Consumer protection lawsuit alleging misleading marketing of high-speed computer memory
social_issues: Workforce reductions and potential impacts on employee morale
Sustainalytics flagged incidents that may negatively impact stakeholders or operations
governance_issues: Legal and regulatory challenges including ongoing disputes and potential financial penalties
